Present Value of a Single Sum
The PV of a single sum is today's value of a cash flow that is to be received at some point
in the future. In other words, it is the amount of money that must be invested today,
at a given rate of return over a given period of time, in order to end up with a specified
FV. As previously mentioned, the process for finding the PV of a cash flow is known as
